column4: hi, if my broadcast address is 192.168.1.255, and my router's broadcast address is 255.255.255.255. How can I change it to match my router's?
it keeps on getting transmission errors if I set it to 192.168.1.255
You can (in theory) set it as 255.255.255.255, but you really, really don't want to do that.
Odds are that it probably wouldn't do what you intend it to do as your router will limit broadcasts to your subnet anyways.
